org.apache.juneau

Class Session

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.juneau.Session
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BeanSession

    public abstract class Session
extends Object
    A one-time-use non-thread-safe object that's meant to be used once and then thrown away.

    Serializers and parsers use session objects to retrieve config properties and to use it as a scratchpad during serialize and parse actions.

    • Method Detail

      • getProperty

        public final Object getProperty(String key)
        Returns the session property with the specified key.

        The returned type is the raw value of the property.

        Parameters:
        key - The property key.
        Returns:
        The session property, or null if the property does not exist.

      • getProperty

        public final <T> T getProperty(String key,
                               Class<T> type,
                               T def)
        Returns the session property with the specified key and type.
        Parameters:
        key - The property key.
        type - The type to convert the property to.
        def - The default value if the session property does not exist or is null.
        Returns:
        The session property.

      • getProperty

        @SafeVarargs
public final <T> T getProperty(String key,
                                            Class<T> type,
                                            T... def)
        Same as getProperty(String, Class, Object) but allows for more than one default value.
        Parameters:
        key - The property key.
        type - The type to convert the property to.
        def - The default values if the session property does not exist or is null. The first non-null value is returned.
        Returns:
        The session property.

      • getClassProperty

        Parameters:
        key - The property name.
        type - The class type of the property.
        def - The default value.
        Returns:

      • addToCache

        public final void addToCache(String key,
                             Object val)
        Adds an arbitrary object to this session's cache.

        Can be used to store objects for reuse during a session.

        Parameters:
        key - The key. Can be any string.
        val - The cached object.

      • addToCache

        public final void addToCache(Map<String,Object> cacheObjects)
        Adds arbitrary objects to this session's cache.

        Can be used to store objects for reuse during a session.

        Parameters:
        cacheObjects - The objects to add to this session's cache. No-op if null.

      • getFromCache

        public final <T> T getFromCache(Class<T> c,
                                String key)
        Returns an object stored in the session cache.
        Parameters:
        c - The class type of the object.
        key - The session object key.
        Returns:
        The cached object, or null if it doesn't exist.

        Returns:
        The logger associated with this session.
